00023 class PalladiumButton: public Button
00024 {

00030         float myAnim;

00034 class PalladiumSlider: public Slider
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         PalladiumSlider(omega::String name): Slider(name) {}

00045 class PalladiumWidgetFactory: public WidgetFactory
00046 {
00047 public:
00048         virtual Button* createButton(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00049         {
00050                 Button* button = new PalladiumButton(name);
00051                 parent->addChild(button);
00052                 return button;
00053         }
00054 
00055         virtual Slider* createSlider(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00056         {
00057                 Slider* slider = new PalladiumSlider(name);
00058                 parent->addChild(slider);
00059                 return slider;
00060         }
00061 };
